title: Ten10
subtitle: Enter your password to open the app
setupSubtitle: You will need this password each time you open the app. Without both the password and recovery key, your data cannot be recovered.
recoveryKeyHint: Enter the recovery key you saved when you set your password. If you have neither password nor recovery key, your data cannot be recovered.
resetSubtitle: Recovery key was verified successfully. Now set a new password for app lock.
recoveryKeyDescription: Store this key in a safe place. You will need it if you forget your password. Without both the password and recovery key, your data cannot be recovered. It will not be shown again.
securityNoteProtected: Opening the app and viewing its content require your password.
securityNoteNotEncrypted: The local database file on disk is not encrypted in this version.
securityNoteRecommendations: Use a strong system password, lock your computer when away, and keep your recovery key in a safe place.
fullResetSubtitle: Delete all app data and remove the lock. You will start with an empty app. Without both the password and recovery key, your data cannot be recovered.
fullResetButton: Reset app and delete all data
fullResetConfirmDescription: All your data (transactions, recurring donations, settings) will be permanently deleted and the app lock will be removed. This cannot be undone. If you have neither password nor recovery key, there is no way to recover the data.
